TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509SecurityTokenProvider extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class X509SecurityTokenProvider Inherits SecurityTokenProvider Implements IDisposable
type X509SecurityTokenProvider = class inherit SecurityTokenProvider interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a security token provider that provides security tokens for a SOAP message sender.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況中，並不需要直接呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider> 類別，因為當用戶端傳送需要 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 安全性權杖的 SOAP 訊息時就會呼叫它。 具體地說，用戶端會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 類別指定所需要安全性權杖的型別，而 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 類別則呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> 方法來取得安全性權杖。 當所需的安全性權杖為 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 安全性權杖時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> 方法就會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> 方法。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed

Docs.param: The to get a security token for.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> 方法會根據 `certificate` 參數中指定的憑證取得安全性權杖。

MemberSignature.Value: public X509SecurityTokenProvider (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue) cil managed

public: X509SecurityTokenProvider(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation storeLocation, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreName storeName, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509FindType findType, System::Object ^ findValue);

Docs.param: One of the values that specifies the certificate store location.
One of the values that specifies the certificate store name.
One of the values that specifies how to search the certificate store.
The value used to find the X.509 certificate in the certificate store.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by getting an X.509 certificate from the specified certificate store criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> 方法會根據符合指定之憑證存放區準則的憑證取得安全性權杖。

Docs.exception: No certificates match the specified criteria. -or- More than one certificate matches the specified criteria.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2

Docs.summary: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the security token.
Docs.value: 取得 ，表示安全性權杖的 X.509 憑證。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> 方法會根據 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.Certificate%2A> 屬性所表示的憑證取得安全性權杖。

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken GetTokenCore(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetTokenCore (timeout As TimeSpan) As SecurityToken

Docs.param: A that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
Docs.summary: Gets a security token using the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor.
Docs.returns: The that represents the security token to get.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在用戶端傳送 SOAP 訊息而需要 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> 安全性權杖時，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 類別會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> 方法。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> 方法。
